inlineContent.text: Build Phase Run Script
Please ensure that the following build phase run script is included:

code: for f in "${SRCROOT}/BuildPhaseScripts/CustomLintScripts/"*.sh; do bash "$f" -H; done

inlineContent.text: If the above is not included, custom linting will not take place.
